title: Fiora's Riposte (W) Interaction with Illaoi's Test of Spirit (E)
body:
How is it that Fiora's W (Riposte) doesn't stop Illaoi's E (Test of Spirit) from getting grabbed? Yes it works on her Illaoi's Q (Tentacle Smash) blocks the damage but she still gets the heal, I don't agree with it, but i understand it by definition. Yet Riposte "_Fiora parries all incoming damage, debuffs, and disables for the next 0.75 seconds..._" does that not include Illaoi's E since "_Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles_" or is it JUST because the initial of use of Illaoi's E doesn't deal damage no interaction occurs. Personally i think it should be blocked and no vessel should be taken since if it can block almost most other abilities and yet it's just a free grab for Illaoi. Please feel free to message me about this, I feel this is a bit unreasonable and should be looked at for a future patch. I feel it takes away to feeling of Fiora's Riposte if it can't at least stop her from getting grabbed by Illaoi.

Thanks,
BagelBomb
